website_summaries.verdict: 16-ounce USDA organic and fair trade certified dark-roast ground coffee, with bold and intense flavor and plenty of jolt.
pros: USDA Certified Organic and Fair Trade ground coffee
Full-bodied, dark roast, intensely flavorful and with a great aroma
Hand-selected beans and state-of-the-art roasting & packaging ensures flavor and freshness
Unconditional 100% refund if you don't like it
cons: Very strong brew, not for everyone

website_summaries.verdict: While it's obviously not the best choice for coffee connoisseurs who prefer mild brews, it's worth a try for those who like dark roasts.
pros: Generates enthusiasm among strong coffee fans, as the flavor is both robust and smooth
We love that it's sourced from fair trade, organic coffee beans
Company stands by the 100% satisfaction guarantee
cons: Some drinkers didn't notice an extra caffeine boost, but many still raved about the bold flavor
Those not used to strong coffee may find it somewhat bitter
Pricey for a pound of coffee

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold. I bought this to keep me alert ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sold. I bought this to keep me alert and focused at work. By my second cup I no longer needed a keyboard or mouse, as I was able to control my computer directly by thought. By the third cup I could hear colors and smell sounds. After my fourth cup, I decided to burn off some of the excess energy with a quick jog, and ended up finishing the Kessel Run in 11 parsecs flat! Seriously... Buy this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Erick W.

customer_reviews.title: Dear Death Wish, I just tried your coffee after ...
customer_reviews.text: Dear Death Wish, I just tried your coffee after receiving it the other day. I always start my day with about 4 cups so I thought, "Eh, why not". After about the 3d cup I decided to start that kitchen demolition I had been wanting to do. But I forgot to turn off the water beforehand. Then I thought, "Eh, I always wanted an indoor pool". Then I thought I should cut a hole in the roof to accommodate a skylight for the pool. Everything is going to plan but I need more coffee now. I need to start on installing the diving board.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who needs blow when you have Death Wish?!
customer_reviews.text: Interested in starting your day of with a bang? Perhaps even a heart attack?! This is the coffee for you! I was spending a fortune on cocaine and amphetamines but now I am saving thousands of dollars a year with a switch to jet fuel coffee!!! Have you seen the movie Limitless? You can see 100 steps ahead of everyone. Only downside is it takes longer to consume due to brewing time. 9/10 star match. Your drug dealer will hate it but your wallet and firing synapses will love it! Disclaimer: Consult your physician before consuming in the event of heart condition or being weak as F*&$
customer_reviews.author: kyle Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: This Is a Public Service Announcement
customer_reviews.text: Ok folks words of warning....if you have heart conditions ...ration out your coffee if you drink 24 oz starbuck grande you need a 8 oz. of this as your FIRST cup...im serious here heed my warning or you could end up cleaning your entire house, doing all your yard work, making love to your partner, waxing your car, building a garage or single handedly raising the titanic own your own ........all in the fist hour after drinking this wonderful coffee ...you have been warned.
customer_reviews.author: ITsTheXFactor

customer_reviews.title: Scrubbed walls and organized my whole house
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is a godsend!! I can't stand black coffee but I've been drinking Death Wish black and the taste is very smooth. It took a little bit for the caffeine to hit, was about to call this product crap, but when it hit.. holy shiiiit it HIT. No joke, there was a point when I felt like I was moving slow and fast at the same time??? I did get a little shaky but didn't bother me much, the energy was worth it. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Amador

customer_reviews.title: beat the refrigerator like a JV wrestler and then ran off yelling something ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this several weeks ago. Finished the first pot and then rebuilt the motor in my Chevelle. While it was running. While riding my Harley. And reloading ammo. Wife wanted a cup but the coffee maker jumped off the counter, beat the refrigerator like a JV wrestler and then ran off yelling something about destroying ISIS. 12/10 will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and that's only because 5 stars is the limit ...
customer_reviews.text: A colleague at work got me addicted to it to the point, that I can no longer suck his resources but I had to figure out where this liquid gold came from and I was super happy to find it on Amazon. You guy seriously make the BEST coffee I ever drank, and I drank quite a few ... This coffee has a wonderful rich and smooth "bulk", no acidic aftertaste, perfectly balanced. Not for the faint of heart, but also not that "strong" (some coffees are "strong" but they just don't taste right) that people would drink it and not sleep for three days or have need for Tumms. I would definitely recommend this one to any coffee addict!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucie

customer_reviews.title: Taste not good as hype. Save money.
customer_reviews.text: I do not see the reason that people pay this high price for the below average quality. Cheaper brand coffee taste much better. So save money and go with other brands you like. I prefer Amazon brand. Be careful about the reviews you see here, all 5 stars may not real.
customer_reviews.author: UN

customer_reviews.title: No extra boost! 4 times the money! Ripoff waste
customer_reviews.text: I noticed absolutely no difference between this and my normal coffee except this costs 4 times the amount of money. DO NOT BUY!!. Stick with your normal affordable brew. I feel like ive been scammed. Throw an extra scoop in if you must. Disappointed * UPDATE 9 days of use and i have noticed zero difference and feel like its a scam. My folders black silk gives me more of a boost for a quarter of the cost. Total waste. I am convinced its regular coffee at a jacked up price . Definitely would not ever recommend
customer_reviews.author: AManWithAHead

customer_reviews.title: this isn't a joke
customer_reviews.text: This coffee unlocks hidden potential, and actually replaces a medication i use to treat fatigue related to multiple sclerosis which saves my health insurance some cash every month... great straight up, but a dab of hazelnut creamer and it tastes like an ice cream sandwich.. cannot not, will not live without this coffee
customer_reviews.author: Jaybird

customer_reviews.title: it was like Jesus himself gave me a shot of adrenaline and ...
customer_reviews.text: So when I drank this for the first time...it was like Jesus himself gave me a shot of adrenaline and said "go....go forth my son and rocketh out!! While handing me a M16 with a M203 attatcent and mowing down some terrorists all while singing jingle bells!! Taste that....it's democracy. Being drank the way it should. Black and bitter. Your welcome America. So go and get yourself a cup of this motivation right quick. We could use more arms against terrosrits!!
customer_reviews.author: Animal

customer_reviews.title: Put me to sleep!  ARG
customer_reviews.text: I have never had coffee put me to sleep faster than this. Brewed in 16 oz French Press with 2 scoops . If this is as strong as advertised I should be climbing the walls. Reading up on how this is even possible I find Mold Toxin contamination in coffee processing can do this to you. The flavor is plain. Not strong. I am really dissapointed and have lost all faith in the Fair Trade certification. I would not buy this for a friend. Unfortunately I am past my return date so I have no choice but to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: allexx

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre coffee with a cheesy marketing slogan
customer_reviews.text: This Coffee is way overpriced. Robusta beans are present, which makes the taste unpleasant. Basically, this company markets their product as the “strongest,” but in all reality, the number of cups needed equal the “worlds strongest” is of no different than a can of Folgers. I went through a $20 bag in about 8 pots of coffee, and this is to deathwish’s serving size. Don’t fall for the cheesy and mediocre marketing strategy. A $10 bag of coffee is all you need with 100% arabica beans. I can only imagine the profit margin this business is receiving for using the cheapest of coffee beans available.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So overpriced.. and I didn't find any of ...
customer_reviews.text: So overpriced.. and I didn't find any of the coffee induced euphoria others mentioned. This is the honest to god truth. If it were 7 or 8 dollars a pound.. yeah I'd buy it.. but maybe I'd also go to starbucks and get a very very lightly roasted coffee. All advertising.. and so sad
customer_reviews.author: perfwise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid coffee drinker. I consume about two pots a day, and was anxious to sample with friends. It was rather odd, that after making this purchase and secretly swapping out my "standard" coffee with this blend, a family member sampled the coffee and said, "this coffee takes like it was purchased from a gas station and left on for 12 hours." Well, this was not a hit in our home, and will be placed on the do not purchase list. Kindly, requesting a refund per the claim as 100% guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: BetaTester

customer_reviews.title: Wet paper bag smell/taste and old coffee
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this coffee and eagerly awaited it's arrival. It finally arrived and with great anticipation opened the bag only to see dry looking regular coffee. Smell was ehhhh. Ok, perhaps the taste will be great. Nope, not even. Reminded me of a wet paper bag smell/taste. Looked at the bag and found a best by 3/20 date. So sad, everyone knows coffee needs to be drank soon after grinding. Can get away if bag is vacuumed sealed, which this was not. Will be returning for a refund. Nasty as2 sh17.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader - Bear

customer_reviews.title: weak
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this coffee because it was good and strong. I decided to treat myself to a bag. I was excited once it arrived and I made a pot. I was really disappointed after making it because it was weak. I thought maybe I just didnt add enough coffee to my plunger pot. I waited a day or 2 and made another pot but this time used 2 times more than I would usually used. The coffee came out weak!!! I wonder if I just have a weak bag or if they changed their formula for the coffee. Unfortunately I am not able to return the product because they dont take returns. There goes $20 down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: ron gutowski

customer_reviews.title: The coffee itself is quite nice. I usually have to add lots of sugar ...
customer_reviews.text: The coffee itself is quite nice. I usually have to add lots of sugar to mine. But that's not what I had gotten it for. I got it because I had heard so many crazy stories from people who had tried it. It gave them crazy amounts of energy. I do have Add, so caffeine tends to make me sleepy, so I was hoping I would get the energy boost I don't usually get from coffee. I was let down. The only effect was staying up longer. No insane bursts of energy. I felt normal. TL;DR - If you want to buy it, so so for the flavor, not the caffeine
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Sky is the Limit
customer_reviews.text: My first cup of your delicious coffee is history. The guy who was supposed to clean the chimney yesterday never showed so I just came down off the roof from taking care of that. While there I noticed the brick mortar needed re-pointing so that's history. On the way down the ladder I huffed & puffed and blew all the leaves out the gutters. Now when I go in and brew up another cup, the sky is the limit! Who know's what's next! Great coffee. This first bag arrived as ground. My mistake as I always grind my beans for the freshest cup. Can't wait to get a bag of whole bean for that experience. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Craig K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging!
customer_reviews.text: The coffee arrived today, as soon as I picked the package I noticed a coffee odor coming out of it which means that the bag was not tightly shut, when I opened amazon box and saw death wish box it was badly damaged with the coffee bag is also in bad shape, some coffee ground inside the outer box confirmed that the bag has in fact been leaking, I haven't tried the coffee yet but at this point I'm afraid that it has already lost much of its characteristics
customer_reviews.author: Sal Buzz

customer_reviews.title: If you can't afford it, then steal it from someone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Woooow, I'm writing a review on coffee. I state this as I would not do this but I had to make an acceptance here. With that said, this coffee is all that and more exceeding. I have consumed flavors from around the globe and this ranks high on my list of amazing flavorful java. You can drink it black and it doesn't have a bite but a smooth taste to it. Its bold approach to caffeine will possess you to have a party in your car on the way to work, etc.... What I'm saying is, don't second guess your self just buy this coffee and allow your pallet to take a journey. Yea, I said it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moss49

customer_reviews.title: Someone made a death wish in this coffee. Dead dull tasting coffee.
customer_reviews.text: No flavor or aroma to this coffee. The grounds were very dry and dull looking. Not fresh coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Thiena77

customer_reviews.title: Gave me the worst heartburn!
customer_reviews.text: Though it definitely kept me awake during my 12 hour night shift at the hospital, it felt like a furnace burning just below my sturnum. I took a few antacids but it took three hours of sustained burning until it even began to subside. I’ve learned my lesson, I will not do that again. The taste was so-so, it was fresh and a good size bag. But now I have a full pack and not a clue what to do with the rest. I don’t have the heart to share it with my work crew.
customer_reviews.author: M_Lo0901

customer_reviews.title: ... other coffees into this price range and not being happy. A few people who's opinion I trust
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical having tried various other coffees in this price range and not being happy. A few people who's opinion I trust, said it was very good and I have to agree. First try, I followed the directions, it seemed to be a lot of coffee per oz of water, but it was delicious. Made it several times since then with less and the coffee still tastes good. I normally drink 3 cups a day, and I did find a nice increase in caffeine.
customer_reviews.author: Doesntfknmatter

customer_reviews.title: Better than Starbucks
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been on a mission to get away from Starbucks due to political reasons. We have tried countless coffees and honestly, this is THE ONE! My husband and I are both coffee snobs, in love with a nice, strong, not bitter coffee. Death Wish is now our go-to coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Aroma of Deliciousness
customer_reviews.text: From the minute I opened the bag, the smell was intoxicating with deliciousness. My whole kitchen smelled of a heavenly aroma, then as it was brewing my whole house smelled of this deliciousness. The coffee is smooth, no bitterness at ALL. The cherry/chocolate finish leaves you wanting more. A few reviews said this coffee was to expensive, but if you can afford Starbucks NASTY A$$ coffee, that leaves a horrible aftertaste, so bad you need to brush your teeth, you can definitely afford this gourmet, intoxicating, heavenly, deliciousness. Once you have a cup, you will want more, I will be reordering. Hey Death Wish Coffee, how about a t-shirt...lol 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kel

customer_reviews.title: A unique experience
customer_reviews.text: Being a coffee connoisseur for decades I had to try this as soon as I saw it. A bit on the pricey side but considering it as a treat I clicked it. It arrived promptly in a nice box fit for a little whiskey bottle in a purple velvet bag. The box was tastefully done with proper warnings before consuming... :) It brewed into quite a good cup of Joe, quite tasty without being overbearing and going to the gym afterwards gave me quite the workout. The packaging even came with a decal like what the cool kids put on their laptops! If you are a coffee lover you should consider giving this one a try.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Haven't died yet. >:l
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid coffee drinker. It's one of my more milder vices and I'm unashamed. I like this coffee for a number of reasons: 1. It's strong. It's strong like a supportive friendly morning hug. 2. It's organic and it just coats my feelsies in false hope that I'm lessening my chances of getting some form of cancer. 3. Ya don't need a lot to make a delicious pot of coffee. SO while it's expensive, it doesn't get used quickly. Huzzah.
customer_reviews.author: Jihye

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee with great taste
customer_reviews.text: I stated drinking this when my other coffee just wasn't cutting it. I would get to 10am in my workday and start needing more coffee. I was apprehensive at first since other high caffeine coffees wouldn't taste good but I was pleasantly surprised at the smooth taste. Don't get me wrong, if I use too much it will be slightly bitter but if used properly it will be one delicious morning perk that lasts the full workday. Just be careful about sharing. I bought some for the office and some of them could handle the higher caffeine content.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: ok didnt work....
customer_reviews.text: i brewed pour over for 5:30 and drank and no signifcant nootropic effect .... no significant boost to memory/mood/creativity, just a small feel of headache stimulation, i dont get it..... maybe the blend not right for me..... had t o go back to usual honest tea black tea line for better nootropic effect,this boost memory/mood/creativity much better .... i had coffe boost better than this so its not like coffee not effective but i found every brand different in effects so a lot of trail and error hassle unfortunately....
customer_reviews.author: evolving human

customer_reviews.title: Now THIS is Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I normally have a cup of coffee with a no-doz tablet followed by a monster energy drink (and still want to go back to bed). I brewed this as soon as it came and had 1 cup (strong settingon my coffeemaker). I swear I can hear colors and see smells. This is the effect I need from coffee to get my day going!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Payne

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is EXPENSIVE - dear lord! It is literally 2.5 x the cost per ounce of Amazon's organic peru grind. It tastes good and in my opinion is better than Amazon's Peru blend but not 2.5 x better. I do notice the caffein and thus you could argue you need to drink less...but as with anything, if you consistently drink MORE caffein you develop a tolerance and end up burning 2.5x the money for nothing in my case. I will probably buy it occasionally for when I need max caffein and don't want an energy drink, but it's not worth consistent purchases.
customer_reviews.author: alain

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Let the Name Fool You!  It’s Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We are All In! My boyfriend spent 20+ years in the Navy. Coffee is a food group for him. I bought a 1 lb bag as a stocking stuffer for him this past Christmas. I thought it would taste like old motor oil, given the high caffeine. OMG, it is the smoothest coffee I have ever had! We both love it. We took a 1 lb bag on vacation with us a few weeks ago, just to be sure we had great coffee during our trip. The company goes above and beyond with great customer service. We are now diehard Death Wish fans!
customer_reviews.author: Yogini Lyne

customer_reviews.title: Not no better then any coffee in my book!
customer_reviews.text: My niece told me how much she liked Death Wish. So I order a bag. Kind of went to wrong destination but finally received it today. Couldn't wait to try it. Had a decent smell brewing. I have BP problems so I decided to take reading before I drank it. Was 122/82. I drink one cup and waiter 45min and checked it again. 124/83 no noticeable different. Coffee did nothing for me. Check it againg 1 1/2 hr later my BP was 117/81. Not effect even felt like it made me sleepy. For something to be priced as high and said to be world's strongest coffee I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: Coffee with a whole bunch of kick!
customer_reviews.text: DWC tastes better when freshly ground. The flavor notes are far superior to the pre ground just like any coffee out there. Besides tasting good this stuff definitely has the caffeine kick. Instant alertness. 1 cup is plenty to get you going through the morning vs drinking cup after cup. The one day I decided to try and finish a second cup immediately after my first I could only finish half because of the jolt overload. This will be my go to for morning drinks from now on. Also, the customer service for this small business is superb. They want to make sure you are satisfied with their product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonguy6

customer_reviews.title: Absolute!  Totally the best Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: BY FAR THE BEST COFFEE WE'VE TASTED IN A LONG TIME! By its Name, I hoped it would be strong enough. * After taste testing for a week, it is now on an Auto-Ship. * Smooth, Strong enough at 2 Tablespoons in the One-Cup French Press for my liking; I adjust to 1-1/2 for my daughter, but she could easily enjoy the 2-T's. - My Son... now shows up with "Coffee? Yes, definitely!" NO jitters. No sour stomach. and, No more Convenience store coffee for him. * No strange (not-so-good fragrance, as with my other preferred coffee, which made me suspicious of the quality. I LOVE that it is Organic and it HAS made all the difference!
customer_reviews.author: Timbuktu

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special about it plus overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why this coffee is getting 5 stars?!! It doesn’t have caffeine as advertised, it doesn’t give any kick, it is not strong as they claiming, smells like burnt coffee, it is disgustingly over priced and the bag is hard to open to keep the coffee fresh. Oh forgot to mention you CAN NOT RETURN. The only positive thing is that it doesn’t have the bitterness after taste that you get from other brands. I don’t recommend this coffee to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D.

customer_reviews.title: This coffee is the BOMB !
customer_reviews.text: Omg ! This coffee is so potent! The first day I tried it, I was tired from a 15 mile hike,, so not much of a jolt, just a lift. However, I always liked the taste from the start. But after I got rested up, I drank 3-4 cups and I was going nonstop working and busy 6am to midnight I had full attentiom and concentration to activities (hard for me to do sometimes) and I was not jittery either. I am definitely sold. Great coffee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee When Your Brand New In a Neighborhood. Become Everyone's Hero
customer_reviews.text: Time to rock and roll. After i had two cups I decided to vacuum the carpet. That led into polishing the tile floors. Which of course had to lead into scrubbing down all 4 bathrooms. Then came the next cup of this magic brew. After I finished cleaning the last house on my streets backyard and floors my wife came home from work and I called it a day. Now I am loved by all my neighbors and regularly get invites for more help on they're projects.
customer_reviews.author: Warren C.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the fuss is about
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because it is drinkable coffee, not great, definitely not the best I’ve ever had. To me a really good cup of coffee can be enjoyable black with a tiny bit of sweetener. I can not drink this black, it literally has no flavor, then when I add the cream it tastes like cheap coffee. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2minpins

customer_reviews.title: Attention people NOT affected by caffeine...
customer_reviews.text: If caffeine in regular coffee doesn’t affect you or stimulate you, this coffee will be no different. Caffeine just doesn’t affect people with the certain gene. I am one of them apparently. I purchased this coffee because regular coffee wasn’t helping. It’s the same case with this coffee. On a better note.... I’ve had a few pots of this coffee now and it’s pretty good and doesn’t have that acidic taste at all. It has a deep weird aroma in the package but once brewed it tastes like coffee you’re used but better, especially without that acidic taste I would buy again. Especially since it’s organic and great ingredients 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: pburdi1

customer_reviews.title: Great MOJO
customer_reviews.text: This is a great strong cup of coffee. I love it because of the smooth clean taste. I taste NO BITTERNESS. I love the quality of the ground. I have actually ground this coffee finer for the espresso machine. Wow, great espresso with lots of creamy foam!! I threw out my other G espresso after that. I also never get the jitters so instant fan. I even watched the brew and observed the foam in brew. I immeadiately transfer to a carafe for all day fresh enjoyment. I must say this is the smoothest richest tastiest cup of brew I have enjoyed in quite a while. I am hooked. If your KETO pour on the cream, its like dessert.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: This. Coffee. Is. Life!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee! I don't sleep much because I have children and work overnights. I'm in a financial position and end of month crunch is critical. I always bring the good stuff and things get done. Not recommended for people with heart issues or severe anxiety. It will jack you up!
customer_reviews.author: J Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like crap and may be different coffee inside the bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have Had this coffee before (someone gave me theirs). I ran out of the first bag I had been gifted a couple weeks ago and loved it so ordered it here. It is not the same product from what I can tell. It takes like water and I promise I’m using my coffee maker correctly and using the correct amount of coffee to water. I’m going to try doubling the coffee to water ratio, but for how expensive this coffee is, I am extremely disappointed. I will not be buying this coffee from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Allen

customer_reviews.title: "We have a Death Wish"
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoy our Death Wish coffee. Our first lb was a gift. We so enjoyed it we will be a regular.
customer_reviews.author: joelklite

customer_reviews.title: Ah yes much better now. Very smooth flavor
customer_reviews.text: mmmmm ahhhh Coffee... Must have caffeine. Ah yes much better now. Very smooth flavor, the caffeine kick has me feeling able to handle the most complicated questions such as "What Time is It", "Do you think I look good in this", "What's the circumference of the moons orbit around the earth if it was being pulled into a black hole." To which my reply is take a sip stare intently at said person and smile my special leave me alone smile without saying a word.
customer_reviews.author: GCW

customer_reviews.title: Mom Approved!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a surprise for my mom after she shared it on facebook. I don’t like coffee, but I can tell you it smelled great, and she said she really liked the hints of chocolate and cherry that the bag mentions on the back. Caffeine barely effects her anymore, but she liked it enough that she said she wouldn’t share with anyone else in the house! She did inform me that the price is too high to talk her into a subscription, though, so it will probably stay at “occasional surprise” status.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Behling

customer_reviews.title: Clever branding, but I'm not so sure about its caffeination claims
customer_reviews.text: This coffee brand makes the claim that it has a significantly higher caffeine content than competitors. It is my opinion that it is no more caffeinated than regular coffee; this is merely clever branding by Deathwish Coffee. In any case, the flavor is nice and the coffee provides a fresh cherry flavor via dark roast beans. Overall, I think the coffee is overpriced for its mass-market nature. I have not repurchased the coffee and have turned toward local roasters. I would suggest this as a gift for those sleep-deprived family members, but would not suggest it as a daily drinker due to the cost and lack of "difference" from standard coffees.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Q.

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way. And oh so delicious
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so when they say "world's strongest coffee" they aren't fooling around. I don't drink much caffeine, so when I have a cup of Death Wish I'm ready to take on the world! Lol. But only one or two cups, anything more and I'll feel like I'm on speed🤪. And it doesn't hurt that the coffee has a nice strong, delicious taste. I could drink it all day, but I don't (because, you know, the speed bit). I just wish it was a little less expensive, but you can't really ask for box store pricing from a small business.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy L

customer_reviews.title: It did not live up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try out this coffee after reading all the positive reviews... unfortunately it did not live up to the hype for my wife and me. The taste is the flavor of a medium roast, which isn’t bad, but we were disappointed with the lack of caffeination that it promised to deliver. It simply didn’t give us the jolt we were hoping for. In our opinion, we felt the local Starbucks roast offered more caffeine for 50% less money. We won’t purchase again but as worth trying out.
customer_reviews.author: EKS

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COFFEE!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST COFFEE, ALL AROUND. I have been around the World numerous times. I have drank many different kinds of coffee. This one meets all my needs in one cup at a time. The aroma. From opening the bag to drinking the first pot. Is Great. The taste, Out of this world. Sweetened or not. Creamer or not. I will not change my coffee anytime Soon!!
customer_reviews.author: MorningStar, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee, if I could afford it I would drink this year round. I purchased this for myself for Christmas to take to work and share with my coworkers, everyone really enjoyed the coffee. It's strong, but not so strong that you feel restless jittery. I did get a bit jittery once after 2 large cups, but it was a productive jittery. The whole vibe of the coffee and box is awesome as well, one of my co-workers took the sticker, because it was awesome. I now use the box to store things in in my desk drawer. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious all the way to the last drop!
customer_reviews.text: I love good coffee, I've bought so many different kinds and thought I'd found a good one, until my friend bought me Death wish coffee more as a joke, because he thinks I'm over the top with my good coffee quest. I tried it, I'm HOOKED!! It's so smooth, strong, delicious! I didn't realize how good it really is until I tried my other kind that I used to like. There was such an outstanding difference I couldn't finish it. Death Wish Coffee is a little more spendy, but it's more than worth it!! If you like a good strong smooth cup of java in the morning, try this! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hart 33

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee, but a little expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This was something my boyfriend had been meaning to try for a long time, but had never had the chance. I decided to buy it for him as part of a Christmas present. The first time he made this coffee he made the mistake of making it as with our iced coffee maker brewing it over a 24 hour period. He said that it was very strong and he actually had to water it down a little. I guess the name says it all. I'm not sure if we will buy this brand again as it is more expensive than the other ones that he likes to drink, And there are so many others that he wants to try.
customer_reviews.author: Samtastik

customer_reviews.title: Strong? Check. Smooth. Check
customer_reviews.text: The reviews don't lie. This coffee is very strong. I drank one cup and my head was buzzing a little. It didn't give me the jitters or anything, but I could tell the difference for sure. The real surprise is how smooth this coffee is. I really like the taste. I normally drink Dunkin Donuts coffee and this was smoother than that. Yum.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Two scoops of Death Wish Coffee can be energizing in the morning.
customer_reviews.text: I bought Death Wish Coffee to try, because I have major problems with energy. That is, I never have any energy. Death Wish Coffee gives me enough energy to start my days, and get a few things done. It probably doesn’t hurt that the recommended serving size is two scoops of coffee. Before I tried Death Wish Coffee, I only used one scoop of coffee in my French press coffeemaker. For anyone who needs an extra dose of energy in the morning, I recommend Death Wish Coffee, as long as you use two scoops of it in your coffeemaker. It works for me, at any rate. Linda P.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: The caffeine content is not higher
customer_reviews.text: This is regular coffee. This is in no way stronger than any other coffee. I get more caffeine from other stores,brands. Over priced regular coffee. No returns either
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: CUBAN COFFEE ADDICT SAYS.....
customer_reviews.text: Okay here is my review. I am normally a drinker of strong Cuban coffee like Bustello. However I don’t drink coffee like Maxwell house etc. I found death wish coffee, honestly, to be a good middle ground when I don’t feel like drinking Cuban coffee. This is a good coffee and it came very freshly sealed though it was difficult to open the sealed package. On the whole I am very satisfied. Hey guys where is your merch?
customer_reviews.author: Beat Kai

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Taste, Not Strong Coffee Taste
customer_reviews.text: I brewed some as soon as the package arrived just to find out what $20 a pound coffee tastes like. I was disappointed that it was not strong coffee, which is what I expected. It was smooth, not acidic, and not bitter. That's good. It tastes good and it seems to have an extra caffeine kick. It's worth a try. I don't think I'll spend another $20 on a second package. I've found that mixing this with some Guatemalan coffee makes a flavorful combination. So I am enjoying the adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS NOW
customer_reviews.text: DWC tastes great. I was looking for a coffee with kick to make my Keto coffee in the mornings. At first before drinking it, I was a little fearful that I would be bouncing off the walls, jittery, and no focus. It was far from the truth. There is a great sustained amount of energy when drinking DWC. And most importantly, theres no "fall off" feeling when the caffeine subsides. Overall, I think this a great choice for someone looking for a great tasting, nice kick coffee. Dont be afraid of the skull and bones, its more bringing you to life, than having a death wish. Hahaha. Great coffee, plan on purchasing when my two bags are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Lose-Lose
customer_reviews.text: This coffee lacks flavour so I cannot really drink it for the taste. Despite being highly caffeinated, I don’t feel any different drinking this coffee over drinking any other type. First time I made it, I followed the exact instruction. Didn’t taste good, didn’t give me energy or whatever. By not tasting good, I don’t mean it tasted like strong bitter coffee. No, I like the bitterness; this coffee is just flavourless. Second time, I made it the same way I make coffee everyday. Same idea: no flavour, no energy. Third time I mixed it with another coffee. It just ruined the taste and needless to say it didn’t give me any “energy”.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: Drank at 6pm, writing review at 6am •.•
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use my death wish coffee to make a cold brew concentrate. I ended up using 42 ounces of water and 14 tablespoons of coffee. This made my ratio 2 tablespoons of coffee for every 6 ounces of water. The package recommends 2.5 tablespoons, but I didn’t want to over do it for the first time. I let the coffee grounds brew for 24 hours before finally trying it. I then poured 6oz of death wish cold brew concentrate and 6oz of water to dilute. I drank the cold brew at about 6pm, and I am currently writing this review at 6am. This coffee is crazy good and will have you up and moving! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Tabares Jr

customer_reviews.title: Boost of energy
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cofee. I have a very high caffeine tolerance and lately no coffee can give me that speacial boostin the morning. I was always a Maxwell fan but the past three years the taste was off and wasn't the same. I tied all types and all had that horrible taste of soil of cheap beans. Now this one is smooth and bold not nasty. Now I noticed that drinking a small. It is enough but 2 cups is too much, It creeps slowly (the energy) in about 2 hours later so I take 1 cup in the am and a little cuban shot later. I take my coffee hardcore black no cream no sugar.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.text: I was REALLY looking forward to this coffee...until I brewed it in my Mocha pot. There isn't any ambiguity in terms of proportions with the mocha pot, just fill the water to the basket bottom and then fill the basket with coffee. The average FrenchRoast that I have used for 20-years has a deeper flavor than this coffee. Now, it may turn out that the caffeine level is twice as high, but in terms of flavor...just not there.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Frank

customer_reviews.title: It's surprisingly smooth even when served black
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me you'll go into this thinking strong coffee is bitter coffee...but it's the smoothest cup of Joe I've ever had the pleasure of waking up with. It's the top shelf whiskey of coffees. And it is very strong but the caffeine hits in waves. So you'll go through your day with bursts of energy until you ultimately crash. And when you do...you CRAAAASH. Best sleep you'll ever have as long as you don't have a cup with your dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Henderson

customer_reviews.title: 😕
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it.. Especially after the review we all love... But my Experience was more like.. 1st cup... Checked bag again to be sure i used right one.. 2 nd cup reread proportions 3rd cup, had to leave for work,brought My energy drink for later bc it was clear I was gonna need it... Resumed my 1850 subscribe n save.. Bummer Doesn't really seem much more caffeinated Than our 1850 black gold... Good taste and quality but let down 😕😕😕
customer_reviews.author: 🐆😺MeoW😸🐆

customer_reviews.title: Average Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coffee thinking it would be more bold and would have more "kick" than average coffee. I was disappointed by it. In my opinion, the taste and level of caffeine was comparable to basic store-brand coffee. It wasn't "bad," but it's not a cup of coffee I would go out of my way for. In my experience, it didn't live up to the hype in the promotional copy.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Lazlow

customer_reviews.title: I expected something better.
customer_reviews.text: This honestly tastes like folgers or maxwell house, maybe with a darker roast. Its almost like it is stale or something. The grounds themselves dont have a savory or rich smell, and the brew is kind of nutty tasting and thin. Its really not that good compared similar priced coffee, and I also don't really notice much of a difference with the caffeine either. I really wanted to like this coffee after I had bought some as a gift for someone else without trying it. I got some for myself afterwards and honestly it made me feel pretty awful about giving it as a gift. I would actually suggest getting something else, this was extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Smooth coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better. I read the reviews about this coffee and one of them said a buyer who uses a French press did not think much of this coffee. I use a French press and while the coffee was smooth and had a good taste it did not give me that caffeine kick I was reading about. I had a coffee grinder but it broke a while back. I will probably buy another grinder and buy Death Wish Coffee whole bean this time and give another review after I try that.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: I splurged and got this for my husband, he has almost finished the whole bag and says he has not noticed any difference. I mean he can drink this and just fall asleep 10 minutes later. I accidentally drank some of this and it upset my stomach, but it did not keep me awake or more energetic. I would not get this again, just seems like overpriced coffee with a catchy name.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as the 1st.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the first time last year and thought it was one heck of a strong coffee! I bought it a couple more times after that and noticed that the strength of the coffee was a hit or miss; one bag was strong and the other was like regular coffee. I thought I'd give it another shot after a few months, and again... it's like regular ol' coffee. It's too pricey for it just to be regular ol' coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Didikom

customer_reviews.title: Great STRONG coffee with delicious flavor and a butt-kicking amount of caffeine!!
customer_reviews.text: I love Death Wish Coffee! The flavor is excellent! When made according to the serving instructions on the bag, the brew is STRONG, flavorful (not bitter like you'd expect), and very caffeinated! It was everything I expected and then some!! One cup of coffee accomplished the caffeine fix of two or three other cups of coffee! The price tag was rather hefty considering you go through a lot more grounds per serving than most other coffees and I believe it's a smaller bag to begin with. Aside from that, I still give it 5 stars! Well worth the try if you're interested in coffee that actually works when you've become immune to the caffeine in your regular boring coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Because I get up at 4:00 am for work.
customer_reviews.text: As the head custodian of Capital High School in Olympia Wa, I swear by this brand. My obviously evil alarm goes off at 4:00 am. This means I need higher caffeine levels than most. Pro-Tip: One tablespoon of chocolate syrup per 8 ounces of hot brewed DWC makes the most delicious beverage you will ever have. Forget the coffee stand mocha! This is better! My only complaint, I wish I could "subscribe" to this item on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Carras

customer_reviews.title: Death Wish is more than the ordinary coffee
customer_reviews.text: I was given a pound of Death Wish coffee for a Christmas gift. Excellent gift. I grounded up 1/2 a bag and noticed at work - I work the early morning shift for a bakery - that I was just “humming along” getting things done for early customers. I later noticed I was still humming along two hours later with no jitters or caffeine crash. Well, that first bag is gone and I just received my order - my second bag of Death Wish. I’m a senior - not high school type - and have enjoyed the coffee. Expensive - yes. Worth it - up to you. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: roundrocker

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee taste in cold brew with good caffeine.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee taste great and is strong as advertised. I was hoping it was beans but it came grounded already, which is fine. I mainly use this as a cold brew which taste great. Drinking a 16oz cup in the morning gets me up. I use to drink energy drinks but this coffee has been my go to since I bought it. Will be reordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Chao ChaoTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE IT'S A CON
customer_reviews.text: Tried it with a dripping machine, with a french press, with a chemex and nothing. This coffee is by far one of the worst (flavorwise) and mildest coffees ive ever tasted. I am a coffee lover and addict and i am telling you BEWARE because it seems they thrive on fake reviews or the people that are buying and rating well this product have no idea of what a good coffee is. This review is real and my intention is not bad. I just want buyers to be aware of what they are getting. Some might be happy with it but in my opinion is just a lack of knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Z

customer_reviews.title: Death wish on your pocket book
customer_reviews.text: Honestly had high hopes, it claims to be a dark roast bold coffee with high caffeine (I honestly didn't notice any improvement caffiene wise). I can honestly say it tastes like cheap coffee, like almost instant coffee levels of cheap. Also any creamer you put in will overwhelm any 'flavor' that it supposedly has. Costco Pacific Bold is better all around, including in price. Best yet, you can't return it. Do not buy! Everything said on the package is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurdian23

customer_reviews.title: Short but strong joltnin the A.M
customer_reviews.text: First i really enjoy the flavor of this coffee its bold but smooth. Took about 15 mins to kick in then all of a sudden i start hearing janet jackson Rhythm Nation in my head and i had to bust out some moves. My co workers looked at me like i was crazy and i had no idea what came over me.however that lasted about 20 mins and then i crashed i mean crashed real hard but it was well with it Update: after drinking this for a week i felt letdown never experienced that jolt again like i did with my first cup😕 back to folgers!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.brunson

customer_reviews.title: No pick me up
customer_reviews.text: I usually have 1 cup of coffee in the morning. Needing a little pick me up to get going at 5 am . Reading all the reviews I thought this would be a great plan. So I ordered the coffee with high expectations🤗. I received the my bag in a few days and couldn't wait to make a pot. So the next day at 5 am heading towards my coffee pot and pouring me a cup. Drinking it and feeling nothing. I didnt get no pick me up. Barely woke me up. It was the same as my Cafe Bustelo, the only difference was the price. Very disappointed 😒
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the disclaimers and warning signs. This is a bold brew but nothing too special about that. I don't know if it's the strongest in the world or not, but it certainly is stout. If you like weak, watered down coffee, don't buy this. If you want your coffee to wake you up and give you a jolt, then this is for you. The five star review from me is mainly because I've had other "strong" (bold) coffees before. Most, if not all, have a very bitter taste. Death Wish is not bitter at all. It's a very nice taste and flavor which was surprising. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MatthewL

customer_reviews.title: Be careful - this coffee is addictive!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hooked. I received a pound as a white elephant gift and really loved the rich velvety flavor. When I ran out I went back to my regular kona blend. It tasted like cr@p! So even though this coffee is expensive, I immediately ordered 2 lbs. because it's so dang good. Be careful! It might ruin your regular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to the hype... Regular coffee
customer_reviews.text: Bummer... I was so excited to try this coffee.. Huge let down.. Not worth the money.. Taste was good because I like dark brew.. But I expected some sort of energy uplift waken? SOMEthing? Nothing.... I drink 1 cup of coffee a day so it's not like I'm conditioned.. I have had kona hula girl and felt exactly what I expected to feel with this claiming to be the strongest coffee in the world.. BS
customer_reviews.author: monique

customer_reviews.title: BETTER  TO AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Very boring tasting coffee honestly there is no flavorful notes to this coffee. I don't understand what all the hype is about this product and no I cannot recommend this coffee. I will remember never to purchase this again! I went and bought godiva coffee instead I love there products so I know I can't go wrong. If you want fancy coffee please don't look here and waste your money thank you.
customer_reviews.author: by Z rater

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding organic high caffeine coffee
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product...but be careful. I'd start with no more than a quarter of a cup and sip. Very powerful effect...you dont need to be buzzed...this coffee producers great focus without the agitation. But be careful not to over do...it helps and should not be used to get s caffeine high.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee BUT
customer_reviews.text: The coffee is great but however when I received the box it normally came with a stick for the company logo (missing)#sad. Then the package the coffee is house in has a dusty almost like it was wet look to it with the vent cap missing and a plastic sticker covering where the vent cap would be. I ordered this same coffee before and it was always great#hadCompanySticker. This go round however, I have questions
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Just Amazing. We have been ordering death wish coffee for more then a year and we are always satisfied. Wish is was a little less pricy though. I can go to Starbucks and get some pretty bold coffee for about 13.95 for 16 oz. :-(.. However this is really great coffee and I will continue to order regardless. The ground is great, but buying the whole bean and grinding it yourself, now that's really nice.
customer_reviews.author: NytaTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: ... received this coffee two days ago and I REALLY enjoyed it the first time I took my first and ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this coffee two days ago and I REALLY enjoyed it the first time I took my first and last sip. Very mellow and yummy!!! I thought it would be bitter... Usually, I would have 2 cups of Starbucks coffee in the morning and a 4 shot espresso by 2p. I had one cup of this coffee in the morning that made me feel even better than what I use to drink and kept me more alert and energized for sure!!! I am looking forward to my next cup of coffee this morning!!!!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE CURIOUS AND I THOROUGHLY UNDERSTAND AND CONCUR WITH THE HIGH RATINGS!!! This coffee will definitely remain in my kitchen for sure
customer_reviews.author: N Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Economically it's a sound choice
customer_reviews.text: I been drinking Death Wish coffee for about 6 weeks ... been buying it in 16oz bags ... from my first sip I was hooked...it only made sense to buy it in a 5 pound bag.... it worked out to be much cheaper than buying the 1 pound bags ....been a loyal Folgers drinker for years .. I don't see ever going back to Folgers...the strength of the coffee reminds me being in the field in the Cavalry on active duty .... I love field coffee ....I would highly recommend getting the 5 pound bag to save a few bucks and get it on subscription. ..
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Schweigart Jr

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes but no flavor.  Batch bag maybe?
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this because I'm a fan of strongly flavored coffee. Folks were saying how strong flavored this coffee is but they must have never been in the military. Maybe I just received a bad batch because to me it's just kind of a dirt-floor smelling water. Yes, it has a lot of caffeine, I think I can see sound waves, but strongly flavored? No. Does it even taste like coffee? Not really. I'd give it 1 star, but the caffeine kick does nudge it up a level.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: I used coffee to sleep....that won’t be happening with Death Wish!!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks so much for ruining coffee for me.... From now on, When I walk past Starbucks I laugh & laugh at all those poor suckers that think they know what “Strong” coffee is. I’ve always used coffee to help me sleep or relax (I know, completely backwards). Never expected to find a coffee that could actually make me WAKE UP! So when I prepped my French press for my first cup of Death Wish Coffee, honestly I was pretty damn skeptical. So imagine my surprise when 2 hours later I’m wide awake & cleaning the house like a mad woman! I can’t thank y’all enough for producing such an amazing game changing coffee!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hot Tamale

customer_reviews.title: Best. Coffee. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee ever! I rarely drink coffee, but decided to make this purchase after reading the reviews. Wow, it did not disappoint. Wonderful, smooth flavor. I love the fact that it’s organic and fair trade. However, what most impressed me is how good I feel after drinking it. It’s the perfect balance of energy, focus, and intensity, without the shakes (I normally feel shaky after drinking other coffee). So, if you think the reviews are too good to be true, this is the real thing. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: AmoretheCat

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and Strong!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this coffee is nice and strong, even for someone with a high caffeine tolerance. The flavor is great - very smooth! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee, packaged beautifully and super well received by coffee drinking family.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased coffee for husband two times now. This is a review by a non coffee drinker purchasing for household. The coffee comes packaged beautifully and comes with a sticker (super bonus points for company). The material on the bag is quality and should preserve coffee for a long time. The coffee itself smells amazing and the color is dark and rich looking. Husband wanted coffee that would be strong and not bitter. He uses no creamer or sugar and likes it straight. He said the coffee is just what he was looking for! Great flavors, lots of "POW" and not bitter like so many other strong coffees. I have a very pleased coffee drinking husband!
customer_reviews.author: Mandolin586

customer_reviews.title: OMG the fastest delivery ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this in 1 day even with corona outbreak status..!! so I tried it right away and it tastes awesome......!
customer_reviews.author: YJ

customer_reviews.title: I converted my brother in law.
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for my brother in law as a stocking stuffer. Little did I know he was not a coffee drinker. A few weeks later my sister writes me and says he usually drinks energy drinks which are not good for you. He tried the coffee and actually liked it. It perked him up more than the energy drinks did. He ended up buying a Keurig and wants to try out other kinds of coffee now and he no longer drinks those energy drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed, let's just say that. Very smooth, not bitter and good gawd it packs a punch. Definitely as advertised. I'm use to drinking the 240mg of caffine rockstars, normal coffee pretty much does nothing for me. This stuff I feel. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Jaypeetzoh

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the worlds strongest coffee.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that it comes pre ground. This does two things. It dries out quicker and I can’t see the bean. How do I know if they are using quality beans if they are already ground. Also not even close to the strongest coffee I’ve tried. Whatever beans they used, they were roasted too long and had little flavor and average caffeine of say a French roast. I not only like my coffee on the lighter side for flavor, but the less roasting that’s done, the more caffeine that’s still left. I have worked at several coffee shops and still work with an idustrial espresso machine almost everyday. Won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee
customer_reviews.text: The coffee tasted great! I felt like it did the job. A lot of my friends and coworkers say they get the jitters afterwards, but I felt normal. The difference I noticed when drinking this coffee compared to our usual brew at work, is that when I try to go to sleep, I'm tired, but my mind is still wide awake. I would definitely cut off drinking this coffee no later than by 11AM if you typically go to bed by 9PM.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: A strong but not bitter coffee with an excellent name
customer_reviews.text: I love coffee anyway whether it's decaf or regular; a lot of people are posting catty comments about it just being overpriced coffee but I didn't get it because I thought it would make me run a marathon while knitting sweaters for the world, I got it because I tried it at a friend's and liked it, and liked the name. I wouldn't regularly pay $20 for a bag of coffee but this was bought for said friend as a gift. I don't know if it really is more caffeinated or not but it is worth noting that the weekend I tried this, we sat up playing Cards against Humanity all night on one pot of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Plan to be awake all night!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong caffeine. My husband loves strong coffee and he loves his caffeine. This was enough caffeine in one cup to keep him up all night! The first batch we received must have been bad. It smelled terrible and tasted even worse. However, Death Wish Customer Service was stellar and quickly sent out a brand new bag, directly from their own location! They wanted to ensure it was as fresh as possible. This is amazing and we couldn't have asked for better service. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: SMVfamily

product_meta.title: Death Wish Coffee Company Ground Coffee, 16 oz
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pound (Pack of 1)Through our unique blend of Arabica and Robusta beans and our slow roasting process, we naturally produce coffee with double the strength than your average cup of coffee. There are no additives or additional caffeine added throughout making the blend — only organic, Fair Trade coffee beans.
feature_bullets: Get your Death Wish Coffee fix with this smooth dark roast coffee that is conveniently ground for your auto-drip coffee maker
Take pride knowing that you're drinking USDA Certified Organic and Fairtrade coffee
Our beans are carefully selected & expertly roasted to give you that caffeine kick, bold taste and great aroma that you've come to love
Our state of the art roasting & packaging ensures that your coffee will arrive fresh & delicious. Brew a pot at home or in the office and taste the difference
Try it Risk-Free: Click the "Add to Cart" button now and be the judge. If you don't love our coffee, we'll refund your order, no questions asked

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
